posts.content:
What what you build if you got +4 dex and int and fast movement for free at the start. Also the free feats you get
would be Dodge, combat casting, empower spell and quicken spell. Negatives are -3 to strength. The only restriction is that
it has to be a gnome.

Thank you

David
